nl.weeaboo.vn.scene

Interface IRenderable

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IUpdateable, java.io.Serializable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    IBitmapTweenRenderer, IButtonRenderer, ICrossFadeRenderer, INinePatchRenderer, ITextRenderer, ITextureRenderer

    public interface IRenderable
extends java.io.Serializable, IUpdateable
    Rendering logic for a IDrawable.

    • Method Detail

      • onAttached

        void onAttached(IEventListener cl)
        Called when this renderable is attached to a drawable in the scene.
        Parameters:
        cl - The change listener to add.

      • onDetached

        void onDetached(IEventListener cl)
        Called when this renderable is detached from the scene. This method can be used to clean up any native resources.
        Parameters:
        cl - The change listener to remove.

      • getNativeWidth

        double getNativeWidth()
        Returns:
        The intrinsic width for this renderable.

      • getNativeHeight

        double getNativeHeight()
        Returns:
        The intrinsic height for this renderable.
